sqlMap.select: select entity_description from UNIVERSITY_ENTITY_TYPE where university_id=#university_id#
select entity_id,entity_name from ENTITY_MASTER where entity_type=#entity_type# AND university_id=#university_id#;
select distinct p.program_name from PROGRAM_OFFERED_BY pob,ENTITY_PROGRAM_MASTER p where pob.offered_by=#offeredby# and pob.program_id=p.program_id;
select distinct b.branch_name from PROGRAM_BRANCHES b,PROGRAM_OFFERED_BY pob where b.branch_code=pob.branch and pob.program_id=#program_id# and pob.offered_by=#offeredby#;
